Material used.Description: siRNA-mediated knockdown of DJ-1 in neuronal cell lines followed by treatment with hydrogen peroxide, ER stress inducers, or proteasome inhibitors.

Readout description.Result Description: Over-expression of L166P mutant DJ-1 failed to rescue cell death induced by hydrogen peroxide, ER stress, or proteasome inhibition, unlike wild-type DJ-1.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the literature.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ-1 over-expression served as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector over-expression served as a negative control.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Cell viability â‰¥ 80% compared to untreated controls

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Cell viability < 50% compared to untreated controls
